Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋「都の友」
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka

Entry.JapaneseText: 首都バルカ・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Capital City Balka - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ今品切れ状態！ さあ、帰った、帰った。
Entry.EnglishText: We've just run out of stock! So head home.

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい！
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: 薬を探してる？ 道具屋に来て薬が買えると 思ってるのか？
Entry.EnglishText: You're looking for medicine? You come to an item shop and think you can buy medicine?

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマには、あんまり ウチに来て欲しくないんだよな。 できればね……
Entry.EnglishText: I really don't want any Huma to come to our place often, if at all possible.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな時に、商売なんて やってられるかよ。 出直してくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't do any business at a time like this. I need to make a fresh start!

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々と道具を新しくしたよ。 ちょっと見ていきなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've received a lot of new items. Take a look.

Entry.JapaneseText: 新しい道具が入ったけど…… ……なんだ、ヒューマか……
Entry.EnglishText: I've received some new items, but... What do you want, Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 色々と道具を新しくしたよ。 ちょっと見ていきなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've received a lot of new items. Take a look.

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃいませー
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい……
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140> 道具を買う 世間話をする やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Buy Talk Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくれよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again!

Entry.JapaneseText: また……来なくていいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please...don't come back again.

Entry.JapaneseText: また来てくれよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Please come again!

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式記念で、いろいろ 新商品をそろえてみたよ！ 見ていってくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: In honor of the ceremony, we have prepared a variety of new products for you. Please take a look!

Entry.JapaneseText: まもなくお披露目の儀式だよ！ 観覧のおともに何かどうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: The inaugeration ceremony is about to begin! Would you like something to help to watch?

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、どうにもヒューマに ムカつく事が多くてさ…… あんたはどうだい？
Entry.EnglishText: Lately, I've been feeling really pissed off at the Huma... How about you?

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマ…… なんか俺に文句でもあるのか？ そういう風に見えるんだよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Oi, Huma... You got a problem with me or somethin'? That's the way I see it...

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、どのヒューマも、 イヤな目でガジュマを見やがる。 ふん……
Entry.EnglishText: Jeez, I don't like the way every Huma looks at us Gajuma with that nasty look in their eyes. Hmph...
Entry.Notes: Maybe use another word for Jeez

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの客には品物を 売りたくないんだけどさ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want to sell any items to any sort of Huma customer...

Entry.JapaneseText: 下手な事すると、ミルハウスト将軍の 部下ってのが来て怒られるんだ…… ヒューマ用に値上げも……ダメだよなぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: If you happen to do anything improper, General Milhaust's men will come and give you a scolding...I suppose raising my prices for specifically Huma is a no-go, huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍がうるさいから、品物は売るけど、 ウチでイロイロ買ったなんて、 外で言いふらさないでくれよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The military is very strict, so I will sell you goods, but don't go around telling everyone you bought them from our shop.

Entry.JapaneseText: ウチの店に、ガジュマの客が 来なくなっちまうからな！ ふん……
Entry.EnglishText: I wouldn't get any more Gajuma customers if that word spread around! Hmph...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとは イロイロもめちまったけど、 俺にも悪いところはあった……
Entry.EnglishText: I've had a lot of trouble dealing with Huma, but I also have my fair share of faults too...

Entry.JapaneseText: これからは心を入れ替えて、 みんなのために良い品を売るぜ！ ゆっくり見ていってくれよな！
Entry.EnglishText: I've changed my mind! From now on, I'm going to sell to my products to everyone! Please take your time and look around!

Entry.JapaneseText: いらっしゃい。 いいもん、そろえてるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Welcome. We've got all the goods you'll need.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『お知らせ』 道具愛好家の集いを開催します！ 珍しい道具を自慢し合いましょう！ 当店店主も参加しますよ！ 詳細はお問い合わせください。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Announcement - We will hold a gathering for item lovers! Come and show off your rare items! Our store owner will also participate! Please contact us for details.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『高性能な天秤』 かなり細かい数値まで量る事が できる。愛だけは量れない。 愛だけは天秤にかけてはいけない。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- High Performance Scale - This scale can measure weight down to the finest detail. The only thing it can't measure is love.
Entry.Notes: If there's another idiom here for measuring accurately, maybe use that.
